text:
Unwavering support was evident as Princess Leonor of Spain nervously stood on the sidelines during her speech at the presentation of the prizes of the Princess of Girona Foundation in Lloret de Mar on July 10. Queen Letizia kept a close eye on her.
The wife of King Felipe VI didn’t hesitate to comfort her daughter by gently embracing her before she spoke. This gesture, which did not go unnoticed, had the desired effect, and Princess Leonor delivered a flawless speech in front of her future subjects, all in perfect Castilian without any hesitation. Comments such as “A polyglot princess who embraces Catalonia and all of Spain”, “Impressive”, “She will be the best monarch after her father”, “Spectacular”, and “She is awesome” were reported by Here .
Princess Leonor of Spain is asserting herself, much to her mother’s displeasure: “Letizia is very angry.” Already very popular at just 18 years old, Leonor embodies the present and future of a Spanish kingdom that has been experiencing turmoil for several years.
